Input file: age.csv
Input parameters: "< 40 Years" and ">= 40 Years"
Output: Demographic variable Age with 2 metrics (1) oddsratio and (2) pvalue

Input file: educ.csv
Input parameters: "Some college or College" and "Graduate"
Output: Demographic variable Educ with 2 metrics (1) oddsratio and (2) pvalue

Input file: gender.csv
Input parameters: "Female" and "Male"
Output: Demographic variable Gender with 2 metrics (1) oddsratio and (2) pvalue

Input file: native_lang.csv
Input parameters: "English" and "non-english"
Output: Demographic variable Native Lang with 2 metrics (1) oddsratio and (2) pvalue
